titleStmt.title: Meroveus a Prince of the blood-royal of France A novel.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Bentley and M. Magnes, in Russel-street in Covent-Garden,

notesStmt.note: With [5] p. of advertisements bound at end.
Imperfect; tightly bound, pages stained slightly affecting text.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
